channel.title: vim on log
channel.description: Recent content in vim on log

item.title: vim配置
item.description: vim 看起来还比较舒服的配置 set sw=4set sts=4set ts=4set etset smarttabset autoindentset cindentset smartindentset nu" set smsyntax onset culset rulerset showcmdset scrolloff=3" set statusline=%F%m%r%h%w\ [FORMAT=%{&ff}]\ [TYPE=%Y]\ [POS=%l,%v][%p%%]\ %{strftime(\"%d/%m/%y\ -\ %H:%M\")}set laststatus=2set wildmenuset mousemodel=popupset shortmess=alIset history=1000set hlsearchset incsearchset t_Co=256" ==================== vundle configuration ====================set nocompatible " be iMproved, requiredfiletype off " required" set the runtime path to include Vundle and initializeset rtp+=~/.vim/bundle/Vundle.vimcall vundle#begin()" alternatively, pass a path where Vundle should install plugins"call vundle#begin('~/some/path/here')" let Vundle manage Vundle, requiredPlugin 'VundleVim/Vundle.
